channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for RI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for RI

item.title: Report X-2025040980
item.description:
Report X-2025040980

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-09T12:25:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-10
  • City: WARWICK
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE ON PURPLE BELT. THE METAL DRUM WAS ON THE FLOOR WITH A PUDDLE UNDERNEATH IT. IT HAD A FLAMMABLE LIQUID DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL WITH SHIPPING PAPERS. RESPONDER REFERRED TO THE DECISION TREE AND BROUGHT THE BUCKET BACK TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2025040582
item.description:
Report X-2025040582

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-07T21:14:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-01
  • City: WARWICK
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations at the PVDR location a plastic contained was found with signs of a release. The container had a puncture on the bottom causing the release. It was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.
